previous_statement: Every partition of an n-set has exactly k non-empty blocks for some unique k with 1 ≤ k ≤ n
new_statement: For n ≥ 1, every partition of an n-set has exactly k non-empty blocks for some unique k with 1 ≤ k ≤ n. For n = 0, the unique partition (the empty partition) has k = 0 blocks.
